nodes.text: Fungus farms where underground facilities where nutritious fungi were harvested, which were often of immense size. They were usually located at the bottom levels of a Neimoidian household, where the air temperature was more suitable for proper fungi growth. The fungus (including Mulch mold and li fungus) was often fed to Neimoidian children, but was exported offworld to other markets as well. Dangerous spores were known to be released from the fungi, promoting some medical problems when inhaled. Some Humans who entered a fungus farm experienced the sensation of "dislocation".
